channel.title: The Last Stand | New 667 Server | 24/7 | Looking for Staff |
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]Welcome To The Last Stand![/size][/center]
[center][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4186985/TLSbanner2.png[/img][/center]
[center]The Last Stand is a sick new 667 server. We have a great eco, flawless pking, and insane PvM. We are looking for active players. Please earn your staff spot rather than begging for it! If you ask for it, I can guarantee you will not get it.[/center]
[center][size=16pt] Changelog! | Updated 02/08/'14 | [/center] [center] [spoiler] Added custom buttons to Quest Tab - Includes: - Server title - Prestige Rank - YouTube Trailer for server - Rules of the server - Website for server - Music to listen to while playing
Changed home area - Includes: - Changing placement of home spawn - Changing respawn area - Changing position of npcs - Creating custom npcs
Custom Shops - Includes: - Custom shops - Custom prices - Custom Quantities
Added home square - Includes: - Multiple alters for changing prayer and spellbooks - Adding my custom portal
Custom Portal - Includes: - Teleport to Lucien, the hardest possible boss.
Fixed drops - Includes: - Fixed all drops of all npcs in areas that are killable to drop accordingly
Fixed leeches - Includes: - Fixed all anti leeches that are used as glitches in the game
Fixed commands - Includes: - Fixed loads of commands [50+] to be essential to game that could be unfair - Added new commands to make staff lives easier - Added new commands for players to use
Fixed dice area - Includes - Changed dice location - Added dice rules command to appear in chatlog when teleporting to location
Fixed starter kit - Includes - Starter kit is now organized - Started kit is now better prepared for starting players out
Added new player function - Includes - All server players receive world message when a new player joins the server - All new players will be greeted with an interface welcome them to the server
Fixed bank -Includes - Fixed bank usage at home - Added bank tabs to banks
Custom items - Includes - Created and imported Defiled Tri-Whip - Created, colored, and imported Defiled Defender - Created, colored, and imported Defiled Bow - Created and imported Defiled Ring - Created and imported Defiled Amulet
Fixed trade - Includes - Fixed trade glitch, cannot happen anymore
Fixed teleports - includes - Fixed the "PvP" teleport location - Fixed duplicate welcome message when teleporting
Fixed summoning skill - Includes - Fixed summoning animation - Fixed summoning obelisk
Added donator zone - Includes - Created new donator zone - Fixed random npc spawn - Added possible skilling in donator zone - Fixed custom portal - Added custom portal to donator dungeon - Added banks - Added donator npc - Added snowy location box
Commands - Includes - Fixed many commands that didn't work - Disabled test zones
Completionist - Includes - Fixed completionist cape - 100% fully working and customizable - Added to skillcape shop
Fury - Includes - Added amulet of fury to Melee Armor shop at home
Overload - Includes - Added overload (3) potion to Foods n Pots shop at home
Fixed doors - Includes - Doors are now able to be opened
Fixed fishing - Includes - Added fishing spot for sharks at ;;fish, requires level 74 fishing; requires harpoon
Custom yelling - Includes - Added colors and crowns for staff yelling
Lucien drops - Includes - Fixed Lucien boss drops - Fixed percentage of drops
Revs - Includes - Fixed drops of revs - Added more revs spawns
Duel Arena - Includes - Fixed bugged staking - Fixed countdown timer - Fixed disables by opponent
Old home - Includes - Removed all custom npcs and spawns from old home
Login - Includes - Added custom login screen[/spoiler] [/center]
-Great server -Good staff -Friendly players -working bosses! -Awesome custom weapons!!! -Fixed alot of little bugs and glitches -One of not many servers that has BANK TABS :D -100 different working commands.
[size=12pt]Download: http://www.mediafire.com/download/3noe9n4asm35l13/TheLastStandrsps.jar [/size] [size=12pt]Website: http://laststandrsps.enjin.com/ [/size]
[size=15pt] Server intro. [/size] [spoiler] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F1OQ1t55l0k[/youtube][/spoiler]
[size=15pt]We party hard[/size] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4185386/9c65d7d0c50c2cd0c50fb45b985910c2.png[/img][/spoiler]
[size=14pt]Player versus Player[/size]
[spoiler] [size=12pt] Dueling Arena [/size] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4187089/Screenshot_18.png[/img][/spoiler]
[size=12pt] Edgeville PvP [/size] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4187083/GodswordSpec1.jpg[/img][/spoiler] [/spoiler]
[size=15pt]Badass home[/size] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4187055/Screenshot_1.png[/img][/spoiler]
[size=15pt] Working bosses! [/size] [spoiler][size=14pt]Fully working Nex with drops[/size] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4185392/daed268af89899627d63831003c3f29f.png[/img][/spoiler]
[size=14pt]Glacors with drops[/size] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4185395/a001d0e0a43331f6d270e450cf252a8a.png[/img][/spoiler]
[size=14pt]Get a group, make some bank[/size] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4185402/8db1f32423fe14e97086873f51ce197d.png[/img][/spoiler]
[size=14pt] Corporeal Beast [/size] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4187046/corp.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
[size=14pt] King Black Dragon [/size] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4187053/Screenshot_26.png[/img][/spoiler]
[size=14pt]Fully working Godwars[/size]
[spoiler] [size=12pt] Zamorak [/size] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4187016/Zamorak.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
[size=12pt] Armadyl [/size] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4187020/Armadyl.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
[size=12pt] Bandos [/size] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4187019/Bandos.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
[size=12pt] Saradomin [/size] [spoiler][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4187017/Saradomin.jpg[/img][/spoiler] [/spoiler]
[center][size=24pt]Hope to see you all online! Drop party at 10 online players![/size][/center]

item.title: The Last Stand | New 667 Server | 24/7 | Looking for Staff |
item.dc:creator: @Gewoonmilan Gewoonmilan
item.description:
@Gewoonmilan wrote:

This post looks horrible. Nothing special to it.

However, I logged into the server and I got welcomed by all the staff members and every other player. It seems they really appreciate new players.
I got explained what to do and they stayed with me for a bit.
I went fishing and I noticed a bugged fishing spot. I told the owner, and not 5 minutes later “Quick server reroll, fixing bugs!”.
This showed me that the owner really knows what he’s doing and actually cares about the players.

In my opinion:

-Bad post!
-Great server
-Good staff
-Friendly players
-working bosses!
-Awesome custom weapons!!!
-Fixed alot of little bugs and glitches
-One of not many servers that has BANK TABS

I recommend people to check out the server. Don’t let the bad post discourage you.

In-Game Name : Brr Icecold

Read full topic

item.description:
@Corbink wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Welcome To The Last Stand![/size][/center]

[center][/center]

[center]The Last Stand is a sick new 667 server. We have a great eco, flawless pking, and insane PvM. We are looking for active players. Please earn your staff spot rather than begging for it! If you ask for it, I can guarantee you will not get it.[/center]

[center][size=16pt] Changelog! | Updated 02/08/'14 | [/center]
[center] [spoiler]
Added custom buttons to Quest Tab

  • Includes:
    • Server title
    • Prestige Rank
    • YouTube Trailer for server
    • Rules of the server
    • Website for server
    • Music to listen to while playing

Changed home area

  • Includes:

    • Changing respawn area
    • Changing position of npcs
    • Creating custom npcs

Custom Shops

  • Includes:
    • Custom shops

Added home square

  • Includes:
    • Multiple alters for changing prayer and spellbooks
    • Adding my custom portal

Custom Portal

  • Includes:
    • Teleport to Lucien, the hardest possible boss.

Fixed drops

  • Includes:
    • Fixed all drops of all npcs in areas that are killable to drop accordingly

Fixed leeches

  • Includes:
    • Fixed all anti leeches that are used as glitches in the game

Fixed commands

  • Includes:
    • Fixed loads of commands [50+] to be essential to game that could be unfair
    • Added new commands to make staff lives easier
    • Added new commands for players to use

Fixed dice area

  • Includes

    • Added dice rules command to appear in chatlog when teleporting to location

Fixed starter kit

  • Includes
    • Starter kit is now organized
    • Started kit is now better prepared for starting players out

Added new player function

  • Includes
    • All server players receive world message when a new player joins the server
    • All new players will be greeted with an interface welcome them to the server

Fixed bank
-Includes
- Fixed bank usage at home
- Added bank tabs to banks

Custom items

  • Includes
    • Created and imported Defiled Tri-Whip
    • Created, colored, and imported Defiled Defender
    • Created, colored, and imported Defiled Bow
    • Created and imported Defiled Ring
    • Created and imported Defiled Amulet

Fixed trade

  • Includes
    • Fixed trade glitch, cannot happen anymore

Fixed teleports

  • includes
    • Fixed the “PvP” teleport location
    • Fixed duplicate welcome message when teleporting

Fixed summoning skill

  • Includes
    • Fixed summoning animation
    • Fixed summoning obelisk

Added donator zone

  • Includes
    • Created new donator zone
    • Fixed random npc spawn
    • Added possible skilling in donator zone
    • Fixed custom portal
    • Added custom portal to donator dungeon
    • Added banks
    • Added donator npc
    • Added snowy location box

Commands

  • Includes
    • Fixed many commands that didn’t work
    • Disabled test zones

Completionist

  • Includes
    • Fixed completionist cape
    • 100% fully working and customizable
    • Added to skillcape shop

Fury

  • Includes
    • Added amulet of fury to Melee Armor shop at home

Overload

  • Includes
    • Added overload (3) potion to Foods n Pots shop at home

Fixed doors

  • Includes
    • Doors are now able to be opened

Fixed fishing

  • Includes
    • Added fishing spot for sharks at ;;fish, requires level 74 fishing; requires harpoon

Custom yelling

  • Includes
    • Added colors and crowns for staff yelling

Lucien drops

  • Includes
    • Fixed Lucien boss drops
    • Fixed percentage of drops

Revs

  • Includes
    • Fixed drops of revs
    • Added more revs spawns

Duel Arena

  • Includes
    • Fixed bugged staking
    • Fixed countdown timer
    • Fixed disables by opponent

Old home

  • Includes
    • Removed all custom npcs and spawns from old home

Login

  • Includes
    • Added custom login screen[/spoiler] [/center]

-Great server
-Good staff
-Friendly players
-working bosses!
-Awesome custom weapons!!!
-Fixed alot of little bugs and glitches
-One of not many servers that has BANK TABS
-100 different working commands.
